column4: hi all.....i have AMD2400 with asus n8xvm board which supports sharing ram video processing but i dont get the performance on Ubuntu.which i used to get while using Windows XP.  Is there something i can do?

hi all.....i have AMD2400 with asus n8xvm board which supports sharing ram video processing but i dont get the performance on Ubuntu.which i used to get while using Windows XP.  Is there something i can do?
you can specfiy videoRAM in xorg.conf might help you
